recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
recipes.instructions: Boil spaghetti. Cook bacon. Mix eggs and cheese. Combine everything.

recipes.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
recipes.instructions: Mix chicken pieces with yogurt and the spices and seasoning. Thread onto skewers, then brush with oil. Cook on a griddle plate, under the grill or on the barbeque for 8-10 minutes until cooked through.

recipes.title: Creamy Garlic Chicken
recipes.summary: Tender chicken breasts smothered in a creamy garlic parmesan sauce for a dinner ready in less than 30 minutes.
recipes.instructions: Boil spaghetti. Cook bacon. Mix eggs and cheese. Combine everything.
